name: TouchBarItemPresence
desc: Options that affect user customization of the Touch Bar.

items.name: case `default`(String)
items.desc: The Touch Bar view is visible by default, but can be removed during customization.

items.name: case optional(String)
items.desc: The Touch Bar view isnâ€™t visible by default, but appears in the customization palette.

items.name: case required(String)
items.desc: The Touch Bar view is visible by default and cannot be removed during customization.
